text: The CW has announced dates for the returns of The 100, The Originals, and iZombie, as well as the series premiere of Life Sentence. The sci - fi drama The 100 will be back for its fifth season Tuesday, April 24, following a new episode of the superhero series The Flash. The supernatural thriller The Originals will return for its fifth and final season Friday, April 20, a week after the season finale of Jane the Virgin. And the undead dramedy iZombie will rise again Monday, Feb. 26, kicking off its fourth season. The new comedy Life Sentence, starring Lucy Hale, will debut Wednesday, March 7, following a new episode of Riverdale. Meanwhile Dynasty is moving to Friday nights, beginning March 9.
